title: The Mill on the Floss - "family shoe-buckles"

content.question: The reference to “family shoe-buckles” (immediately preceding final sentence) serves chiefly to

choices.label: minimize the importance that property held for the Dodsons
satirize the Dodsons’ preoccupation with property
generalize about the obsessiveness of a particular class of people
denounce the magnitude of the Dodsons’ material wealth

content.answer: satirize the Dodsons’ preoccupation with property

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
